entry.title: Speaking about scaling Workloads and Azure DevOps Agents running in Kubernetes with KEDA at the DevOps Pro Europe 2023 Conference

link.title: Speaking about scaling Workloads and Azure DevOps Agents running in Kubernetes with KEDA at the DevOps Pro Europe 2023 Conference

entry.summary: I’m excited to announce that I will be speaking at the upcoming DevOps Pro Europe 2023 conference in Vilnius, Lithuania. My session, titled “Level Up your Kubernetes Scaling with KEDA”, will be held online on May 24, 2023. In my session, we will discuss the importance of handling varying loads in service-oriented applications and the challenges modern applications face. We will explore how Kub...

entry.title: Speaking about Hybrid and Multi-Cloud with Azure Arc at the Warsaw IT Days 2023

entry.summary: I am thrilled to announce my second session at Warsaw IT Days 2023, titled “Unleashing the Potential of Hybrid Cloud: Streamlining Multi-Cloud Management and On-Premises Integration” During this session, we’ll dive deep into how Microsoft Azure technologies can revolutionize your hybrid cloud strategy.
